rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with a Vastu-friendly layout ensuring proper sunlight and air flow. It includes an inviting pathway aligned to the east.
A spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the south facade with Art Deco detailing and accent lighting. The design emphasizes symmetry and natural light.
Adjacent to the living room, designed for functional dining space with an open layout that connects to the kitchen. Vastu-aligned placement ensures energy flow.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco finishes and efficient storage solutions. Positioned towards the north-west as per Vastu recommendations for functional utilities.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a balcony facing east to catch early morning sunlight. The design incorporates Art Deco style elements and ensures privacy with floor-to-ceiling windows.
A comfortable second bedroom with an attached balcony on the eastern side. Vastu guidelines ensure optimal energy flow and light.
The third bedroom is designed similarly with a balcony for natural light, following Vastu principles.
A dedicated home theater space featuring comfortable seating and surround sound system. The room is acoustically insulated with Art Deco accents.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to the east as per Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling window on the south side of living room for ample natural light and aesthetic appeal.
Balcony door leading to a spacious balcony on the east.
Balcony access ensuring natural light and open space.
Balcony door for enhanced living experience with sunlight exposure.
Well-insulated window for sound control and ambient light.
